net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.gl

Class SurfaceView.ViewAspectRatioMeasurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.gl.SurfaceView.ViewAspectRatioMeasurer
  • Enclosing class:
    SurfaceView

    public class SurfaceView.ViewAspectRatioMeasurer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a helper to measure views that require a specific aspect ratio.
    Author:
    Jesper Borgstrup

      Get the height measured in the latest call to measure().

      Get the width measured in the latest call to measure().
      void measure(int widthMeasureSpec, int heightMeasureSpec)
      Measure with the aspect ratio given at construction.

      After measuring, get the width and height with the getMeasuredWidth() and getMeasuredHeight() methods, respectively.

      • getAspectRatio

        public double getAspectRatio()

      • measure

        public void measure(int widthMeasureSpec,
           int heightMeasureSpec)
        Measure with the aspect ratio given at construction.

        After measuring, get the width and height with the getMeasuredWidth() and getMeasuredHeight() methods, respectively.
        Parameters:
        widthMeasureSpec - The width MeasureSpec passed in your View.onMeasure() method
        heightMeasureSpec - The height MeasureSpec passed in your View.onMeasure() method

      • measure

        public void measure(int widthMeasureSpec,
           int heightMeasureSpec,
           double aspectRatio)
        Measure with a specific aspect ratio

        After measuring, get the width and height with the getMeasuredWidth() and getMeasuredHeight() methods, respectively.
        Parameters:
        widthMeasureSpec - The width MeasureSpec passed in your View.onMeasure() method
        heightMeasureSpec - The height MeasureSpec passed in your View.onMeasure() method
        aspectRatio - The aspect ratio to calculate measurements in respect to

      • getMeasuredWidth

        public int getMeasuredWidth()
        Get the width measured in the latest call to measure().

      • getMeasuredHeight

        public int getMeasuredHeight()
        Get the height measured in the latest call to measure().
